methods.name: showPopup
methods.description: Focus and open popup
methods.description_zh: 聚焦并打开弹出窗口

methods.name: hidePopup
methods.description: Hide popup
methods.description_zh: 隐藏弹出窗口

methods.name: removeAtIndex
methods.description: Remove selected option located at specific index
methods.description_zh: 删除位于特定索引处的选定选项

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds option to model
methods.description_zh: 向模型添加选项

methods.name: toggleOption
methods.description: Add/remove option from model
methods.description_zh: 从模型中添加/删除选项

methods.name: getOptionIndex
methods.description: Gets current focused option index from menu; It's -1 if no option is focused
methods.description_zh: 从菜单中获取当前聚焦的选项索引;如果没有选项被聚焦，则为 -1

methods.name: setOptionIndex
methods.description: Sets option from menu as 'focused'; -1 to focus none
methods.description_zh: 将菜单中的选项设置为 'focused';-1 表示不聚焦

methods.name: moveOptionSelection
methods.description: Move selected option from menu by index offset
methods.description_zh: 按索引偏移量从菜单中移动所选选项

methods.name: filter
methods.description: Filter options
methods.description_zh: 过滤器选项

methods.name: updateMenuPosition
methods.description: Recomputes menu position
methods.description_zh: Recomputes （重新计算） 菜单位置

methods.name: updateInputValue
methods.description: If 'use-input' is specified, this updates the value that it holds
methods.description_zh: 如果指定了 'use-input'，则更新它所保存的值

methods.name: isOptionSelected
methods.description: Tells if an option is selected
methods.description_zh: 告知是否选择了选项

methods.name: getEmittingOptionValue
methods.description: Get the model value that would be emitted by QSelect when selecting a said option; Also takes into consideration if 'emit-value' is set
methods.description_zh: 获取 QSelect 在选择所述选项时将发出的模型值;还要考虑是否设置了 'emit-value'

methods.name: getOptionValue
methods.description: Get the model value of an option; Takes into consideration 'option-value' (if used), but does not looks for 'emit-value', like getEmittingOptionValue() does
methods.description_zh: 获取选项的 model 值;考虑 'option-value' （如果使用），但不像 getEmittingOptionValue（） 那样查找 'emit-value'

methods.name: getOptionLabel
methods.description: Get the label of an option; Takes into consideration the 'option-label' prop (if used)
methods.description_zh: 获取选项的标签;考虑 'option-label' 属性（如果使用）

methods.name: isOptionDisabled
methods.description: Tells if an option is disabled; Takes into consideration 'option-disable' prop (if used)
methods.description_zh: 告知选项是否被禁用;考虑 'option-disable' prop （如果使用）

methods.name: scrollTo
methods.description: Scroll the virtual scroll list to the item with the specified index (0 based)
methods.description_zh: 将虚拟滚动列表滚动到具有指定索引的项目（从 0 开始）

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the virtual scroll computations; Needed for custom edge-cases
methods.description_zh: 重置虚拟滚动计算;自定义边缘情况需要

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Refreshes the virtual scroll list; Use it after appending items
methods.description_zh: 刷新虚拟滚动列表;在附加项后使用

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Focus component
methods.description_zh: 焦点组件

methods.name: blur
methods.description: Blur component (lose focus)
methods.description_zh: 模糊组件（失去焦点）

events.name: input-value
events.description: Emitted when the value in the text input changes
events.description_zh: 当文本输入中的值发生变化时发出

events.name: remove
events.description: Emitted when an option is removed from selection
events.description_zh: 从选择中删除选项时发出

events.name: add
events.description: Emitted when an option is added to the selection
events.description_zh: 将选项添加到所选内容时发出

events.name: new-value
events.description: Enables creation of new values; Emitted when a new value has been created; You can override 'new-value-mode' property with it
events.description_zh: 支持创建新值;创建新值时发出;你可以用它来覆盖 'new-value-mode' 属性

events.name: filter
events.description: Emitted when user wants to filter a value
events.description_zh: 当用户想要筛选值时发出
events.params: (inputValue: String, doneFn: Function, abortFn: Function) => void

events.name: filter-abort
events.description: Emitted when a filtering was aborted; Probably a new one was requested?
events.description_zh: 中止筛选时发出;可能要求一个新的？

events.name: popup-show
events.description: Emitted when the select options menu or dialog is shown.
events.description_zh: 在显示 select options （选择选项） 菜单或对话框时发出。

events.name: popup-hide
events.description: Emitted when the select options menu or dialog is hidden.
events.description_zh: 当 select options （选择选项） 菜单或对话框隐藏时发出。

events.name: virtual-scroll
events.description: Emitted when the virtual scroll occurs
events.description_zh: 在虚拟滚动发生时发出

events.name: focus
events.description_zh: 当组件获得焦点时发出

events.name: blur
events.description_zh: 当组件失去焦点时发出

events.name: clear
events.description: When using the 'clearable' property, this event is emitted when the clear icon is clicked
events.description_zh: 当使用 'clearable' 属性时，当单击 clear 图标时，将触发此事件

v-model.description: Model of the component; Must be Array if using 'multiple' prop; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive
v-model.description_zh: 组件的模型;如果使用 'multiple' prop，则必须为 Array;使用此属性（以及 'update：modelValue' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令
v-model.desc: Model of the component; Must be Array if using 'multiple' prop; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

multiple.description: Allow multiple selection; Model must be Array
multiple.description_zh: 允许多选;Model 必须是 Array

display-value.description: Override default selection string, if not using 'selected' slot/scoped slot and if not using 'use-chips' prop
display-value.description_zh: 如果不使用 'selected' 插槽/scoped 插槽，如果不使用 'use-chips' 属性，则覆盖默认选择字符串

display-value-html.description: Force render the selected option(s) as HTML; This can lead to XSS attacks so make sure that you sanitize the content; Does NOT apply when using 'selected' or 'selected-item' slots!
display-value-html.description_zh: 强制将所选选项渲染为 HTML;这可能会导致 XSS 攻击，因此请确保对内容进行清理;在使用 'selected' 或 'selected-item' 插槽时不适用！
display-value-html.desc: Force render the selected option(s) as HTML; This can lead to XSS attacks so make sure that you sanitize the content; Does NOT apply when using 'selected' or 'selected-item' slots!

:options.description: Available options that the user can select from. For best performance freeze the list of options.
:options.description_zh: 用户可以从中选择的可用选项。为了获得最佳性能，请冻结选项列表。

option-value.description: Property of option which holds the 'value'; If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline
option-value.description_zh: 保存 'value' 的 option 属性;如果使用函数，则为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围引用它，而不是内联定义它

option-label.description: Property of option which holds the 'label'; If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline
option-label.description_zh: 保存 'label' 的选项的属性;如果使用函数，则为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围引用它，而不是内联定义它

option-disable.description: Property of option which tells it's disabled; The value of the property must be a Boolean; If using a function then for best performance, reference it from your scope and do not define it inline
option-disable.description_zh: option 的属性，告诉它已禁用;该属性的值必须是布尔值;如果使用函数，则为了获得最佳性能，请从您的范围引用它，而不是内联定义它

hide-selected.description: Hides selection; Use the underlying input tag to hold the label (instead of showing it to the right of the input) of the selected option; Only works for non 'multiple' Selects
hide-selected.description_zh: 隐藏选择;使用基础 input 标签来保存所选选项的标签（而不是将其显示在 input 的右侧）;仅适用于非 'multiple' Selects

max-values.description: Allow a maximum number of selections that the user can do
max-values.description_zh: 允许用户执行的最大选择数

options-dense.description: Dense mode for options list; occupies less space
options-dense.description_zh: 选项列表的密集模式;占用更少的空间
options-dense.desc: Dense mode for options list; occupies less space

options-dark.description: Options menu will be colored with a dark color
options-dark.description_zh: 选项菜单将用深色着色

options-selected-class.description: CSS class name for options that are active/selected; Set it to an empty string to stop applying the default (which is text-* where * is the 'color' prop value)
options-selected-class.description_zh: 活动/选定选项的 CSS 类名称;将其设置为空字符串以停止应用默认值（即 text-*，其中 * 是 'color' 属性值）

options-html.description: Force render the options as HTML; This can lead to XSS attacks so make sure that you sanitize the content; Does NOT apply when using 'option' slot!
options-html.description_zh: 强制将选项渲染为 HTML;这可能会导致 XSS 攻击，因此请确保对内容进行清理;使用 'option' 插槽时不适用！
options-html.desc: Force render the options as HTML; This can lead to XSS attacks so make sure that you sanitize the content; Does NOT apply when using 'option' slot!

options-cover.description: Expanded menu will cover the component (will not work along with 'use-input' prop for obvious reasons)
options-cover.description_zh: 展开的菜单将覆盖组件（由于显而易见的原因，不能与 'use-input' 属性一起使用）

menu-shrink.description: Allow the options list to be narrower than the field (only in menu mode)
menu-shrink.description_zh: 允许选项列表比字段窄（仅在菜单模式下）

menu-anchor.type: top left / top middle / top right / top start / top end / center left / center middle / center right / center start / center end / bottom left / bottom middle / bottom right / bottom start / bottom end
menu-anchor.description: Two values setting the starting position or anchor point of the options list relative to the field (only in menu mode)
menu-anchor.description_zh: 两个值，用于设置选项列表相对于字段的起始位置或锚点（仅在菜单模式下）

menu-self.type: top left / top middle / top right / top start / top end / center left / center middle / center right / center start / center end / bottom left / bottom middle / bottom right / bottom start / bottom end
menu-self.description: Two values setting the options list's own position relative to its target (only in menu mode)
menu-self.description_zh: 两个值设置选项列表相对于其目标的位置（仅在菜单模式下）

menu-offset.description: An array of two numbers to offset the options list horizontally and vertically in pixels (only in menu mode)
menu-offset.description_zh: 一个包含两个数字的数组，用于以像素为单位水平和垂直偏移选项列表（仅在菜单模式下）

popup-content-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the popup content
popup-content-class.description_zh: 要归属于弹出窗口内容的类定义

popup-content-style.description: Style definitions to be attributed to the popup content
popup-content-style.description_zh: 要归属于弹出窗口内容的样式定义

popup-no-route-dismiss.description: Changing route app won't dismiss the popup (menu or dialog)
popup-no-route-dismiss.description_zh: 更改路线应用程序不会关闭弹出窗口（菜单或对话框）

use-chips.description: Use QChip to show what is currently selected
use-chips.description_zh: 使用 QChip 显示当前选择的内容

use-input.description: Use an input tag where users can type
use-input.description_zh: 使用用户可以键入的 input 标签

maxlength.description: Specify a max length for the inner input tag (if 'use-input' is enabled)
maxlength.description_zh: 指定内部 input 标签的最大长度（如果启用了 'use-input'）

fill-input.description: Fills the input with current value; Useful along with 'hide-selected'; Does NOT works along with 'multiple' selection
fill-input.description_zh: 用当前值填充 input;与 'hide-selected' 一起有用;不能与“多个”选择一起使用

new-value-mode.description: Enables creation of new values and defines behavior when a new value is added: 'add' means it adds the value (even if possible duplicate), 'add-unique' adds only unique values, and 'toggle' adds or removes the value (based on if it exists or not already); When using this prop then listening for @new-value becomes optional (only to override the behavior defined by 'new-value-mode')
new-value-mode.description_zh: 启用创建新值并定义添加新值时的行为： 'add' 表示添加值（即使可能重复）， 'add-unique' 仅添加唯一值，'toggle' 添加或删除值（基于它是否存在）;当使用此 prop 时，监听 @new 值就变成了可选的（仅用于覆盖 'new-value-mode' 定义的行为）

map-options.description: Try to map labels of model from 'options' Array; has a small performance penalty; If you are using emit-value you will probably need to use map-options to display the label text in the select field rather than the value;  Refer to the 'Affecting model' section above
map-options.description_zh: 尝试从 'options' 数组映射模型的标签;性能损失较小;如果你正在使用 emit-value，你可能需要使用 map-options 在 select 字段中显示标签文本，而不是 value; 请参阅上面的“影响模型”部分

disable-tab-selection.description: Prevents the tab key from confirming the currently hovered option
disable-tab-selection.description_zh: 阻止 Tab 键确认当前悬停的选项

emit-value.description: Update model with the value of the selected option instead of the whole option
emit-value.description_zh: 使用所选选项的值而不是整个选项更新模型

input-debounce.description: Debounce the input model update with an amount of milliseconds (also affects the 'filter' event, if used)
input-debounce.description_zh: 以毫秒为单位对输入模型更新进行去抖动（如果使用，也会影响 'filter' 事件）

input-class.description: Class definitions to be attributed to the underlying input tag
input-class.description_zh: 要归属于底层 input 标签的类定义

input-style.description: Style definitions to be attributed to the underlying input tag
input-style.description_zh: 要归属于基础 input 标记的样式定义

transition-show.description: Transition when showing the menu/dialog; One of Quasar's embedded transitions
transition-show.description_zh: 显示菜单/对话框时的过渡;Quasar 的嵌入式过渡之一
transition-show.desc: Transition when showing the menu/dialog; One of Quasar's embedded transitions

transition-hide.description: Transition when hiding the menu/dialog; One of Quasar's embedded transitions
transition-hide.description_zh: 隐藏菜单/对话框时的过渡;Quasar 的嵌入式过渡之一
transition-hide.desc: Transition when hiding the menu/dialog; One of Quasar's embedded transitions

transition-duration.description: Transition duration when hiding the menu/dialog (in milliseconds, without unit)
transition-duration.description_zh: 隐藏菜单/对话框时的过渡持续时间（以毫秒为单位，不含单位）

behavior.description: Overrides the default dynamic mode of showing as menu on desktop and dialog on mobiles
behavior.description_zh: 覆盖在桌面上显示为菜单，在移动设备上显示为对话框的默认动态模式

name.description: Used to specify the name of the control; Useful if dealing with forms submitted directly to a URL
name.description_zh: 用于指定控件的名称;如果处理直接提交到 URL 的表单，则很有用

virtual-scroll-item-size.description: Default size in pixels (height if vertical, width if horizontal) of an item; This value is used for rendering the initial list; Try to use a value close to the minimum size of an item
virtual-scroll-item-size.description_zh: 项目的默认大小（以像素为单位）（如果垂直时为高度，如果水平时为宽度）;此值用于呈现初始列表;尝试使用接近项的最小大小的值

virtual-scroll-horizontal.description: Make virtual list work in horizontal mode
virtual-scroll-horizontal.description_zh: 使虚拟列表在水平模式下工作

virtual-scroll-slice-size.description: Minimum number of items to render in the virtual list
virtual-scroll-slice-size.description_zh: 要在虚拟列表中呈现的最小项目数

virtual-scroll-slice-ratio-before.description: Ratio of number of items in visible zone to render before it
virtual-scroll-slice-ratio-before.description_zh: 可见区域中的项目数与渲染前的比率

virtual-scroll-slice-ratio-after.description: Ratio of number of items in visible zone to render after it
virtual-scroll-slice-ratio-after.description_zh: 可见区域中的项目数与之后渲染的比率

virtual-scroll-sticky-size-start.description: Size in pixels (height if vertical, width if horizontal) of the sticky part (if using one) at the start of the list; A correct value will improve scroll precision
virtual-scroll-sticky-size-start.description_zh: 列表开头的粘性部分（如果使用）的大小（如果垂直则为高度，如果为水平，则以宽度为单位）;正确的值将提高滚动精度

virtual-scroll-sticky-size-end.description: Size in pixels (height if vertical, width if horizontal) of the sticky part (if using one) at the end of the list; A correct value will improve scroll precision
virtual-scroll-sticky-size-end.description_zh: 列表末尾的粘性部分（如果使用）的大小（如果垂直则为高度，如果为水平，则以宽度为单位）;正确的值将提高滚动精度

table-colspan.description: The number of columns in the table (you need this if you use table-layout: fixed)
table-colspan.description_zh: 表中的列数（如果您使用 table-layout： fixed，则需要此列）

label.description: A text label that will “float” up above the input field, once the field gets focus
label.description_zh: 一个文本标签，一旦字段获得焦点，该标签将“浮动”在输入字段上方

stack-label.description: Label will be always shown above the field regardless of field content (if any)
stack-label.description_zh: 无论字段内容如何（如果有），标签将始终显示在字段上方

hint.description: Helper (hint) text which gets placed below your wrapped form component
hint.description_zh: Helper （hint） 文本，该文本放置在包装的表单组件下方

hide-hint.description: Hide the helper (hint) text when field doesn't have focus
hide-hint.description_zh: 当字段没有焦点时隐藏帮助程序（提示）文本

label-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
label-color.desc: Color name for the label from the Quasar Color Palette; Overrides the 'color' prop; The difference from 'color' prop is that the label will always have this color, even when field is not focused
label-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for the label from the Quasar Color Palette; Overrides the 'color' prop; The difference from 'color' prop is that the label will always have this color, even when field is not focused
color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

bg-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
bg-color.desc: Color name for the label from the Quasar Color Palette; Overrides the 'color' prop; The difference from 'color' prop is that the label will always have this color, even when field is not focused
bg-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

loading.description: Signals the user a process is in progress by displaying a spinner; Spinner can be customized by using the 'loading' slot.
loading.description_zh: 通过显示微调器向用户发出进程正在进行的信号;Spinner 可以通过使用 'loading' 插槽进行自定义。

clearable.description: Appends clearable icon when a value (not undefined or null) is set; When clicked, model becomes null
clearable.description_zh: 在设置值（非 undefined 或 null）时附加可清除图标;单击后，model 变为 null

clear-icon.description: Custom icon to use for the clear button when using along with 'clearable' prop
clear-icon.description_zh: 与 'clearable' prop 一起使用时用于 clear 按钮的自定义图标

borderless.description_zh: 对字段使用“无边界”设计

standout.description: Use 'standout' design for the field; Specifies classes to be applied when focused (overriding default ones)
standout.description_zh: 为该领域使用“突出”设计;指定在聚焦时要应用的类（覆盖默认类）

label-slot.description: Enables label slot; You need to set it to force use of the 'label' slot if the 'label' prop is not set
label-slot.description_zh: 启用标签插槽;如果未设置 'label' 属性，您需要将其设置为强制使用 'label' 插槽

hide-bottom-space.description: Do not reserve space for hint/error/counter anymore when these are not used; As a result, it also disables the animation for those; It also allows the hint/error area to stretch vertically based on its content
hide-bottom-space.description_zh: 当这些不使用时，不要再为 hint/error/counter 保留空间;因此，它还会禁用这些对象的动画;它还允许提示/错误区域根据其内容垂直拉伸

counter.description: Show an automatic counter on bottom right
counter.description_zh: 在右下角显示自动计数器

square.description: Remove border-radius so borders are squared; Overrides 'rounded' prop
square.description_zh: 删除 border-radius，以便边界是方形的;覆盖 'rounded' prop

item-aligned.description: Match inner content alignment to that of QItem
item-aligned.description_zh: 将内部内容对齐与 QItem 的对齐方式

autofocus.description: Focus field on initial component render
autofocus.description_zh: 初始组件渲染上的焦点字段

for.description: Used to specify the 'id' of the control and also the 'for' attribute of the label that wraps it; If no 'name' prop is specified, then it is used for this attribute as well
for.description_zh: 用于指定控件的 'id' 以及包装它的标签的 'for' 属性;如果未指定 'name' prop，则它也用于此属性

slots.name: selected
slots.description: Override default selection slot; Suggestion: QChip

slots.name: loading
slots.description: Override default spinner when component is in loading mode; Use in conjunction with 'loading' prop
slots.description_zh: 当组件处于加载模式时覆盖默认微调器;与 'loading' prop 结合使用

slots.name: before-options
slots.description: Template slot for the elements that should be rendered before the list of options
slots.description_zh: 应在选项列表之前渲染的元素的模板插槽

slots.name: after-options
slots.description: Template slot for the elements that should be rendered after the list of options
slots.description_zh: 应在选项列表之后呈现的元素的模板插槽

slots.name: no-option
slots.description: What should the menu display after filtering options and none are left to be displayed; Suggestion: <div>
slots.description_zh: 筛选选项后菜单应该显示什么，并且没有要显示的内容;建议： <div>

slots.name: selected-item
slots.description: Override default selection slot; Suggestion: QChip

slots.name: option
slots.description: Customize how options are rendered; Suggestion: QItem
slots.description_zh: 自定义选项的呈现方式;建议：QItem

slots.name: prepend
slots.description: Prepend inner field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn
slots.description_zh: 预置 inner field;建议： QIcon， QBtn

slots.name: append
slots.description: Append to inner field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn
slots.description_zh: 附加到内部字段;建议： QIcon， QBtn

slots.name: before
slots.description: Prepend outer field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn
slots.description_zh: 预置 outer field;建议： QIcon， QBtn

slots.name: after
slots.description: Append outer field; Suggestions: QIcon, QBtn
slots.description_zh: 附加外部字段;建议： QIcon， QBtn

slots.name: label
slots.description: Slot for label; Used only if 'label-slot' prop is set or the 'label' prop is set; When it is used the text in the 'label' prop is ignored
slots.description_zh: 标签槽;仅在设置了 'label-slot' prop 或设置了 'label' prop 时使用;当使用它时，'label' prop 中的文本将被忽略

slots.name: error
slots.description: Slot for errors; Enabled only if 'bottom-slots' prop is used; Suggestion: <div>
slots.description_zh: 错误槽;仅在使用 'bottom-slots' prop 时启用;建议： <div>

slots.name: hint
slots.description: Slot for hint text; Enabled only if 'bottom-slots' prop is used; Suggestion: <div>
slots.description_zh: 提示文本的插槽;仅在使用 'bottom-slots' prop 时启用;建议： <div>

slots.name: counter
slots.description: Slot for counter text; Enabled only if 'bottom-slots' prop is used; Suggestion: <div>
slots.description_zh: 计数器文本的插槽;仅在使用 'bottom-slots' prop 时启用;建议： <div>
